cover.value: Since I was a toddler I've always loved computer science. Not only was I surrended by micro computers but I also grew up with the word wide web.
By the time I graduated, choosing a major was obvious to me. I had to study computer science at the EPITECH
Working in the software industry since 2007, I've used several technologies such as PHP, JavaScript, or the .Net stack.
I chose to specialise in the later, but still kept a critical mind toward Microsoft technologies.
After a few years and knowing where .Net Core is headed, I'm glad I made this choice.
My influences are people from very different background in the industry.
They are named Martin Fowler, Greg Young, José Valim, Miran Lipovača or Uncle Bob.
The issues I'm keen on these days are:
